name: 迪恩·斯托克维尔 Dean Stockwell
intro: Robert Dean Stockwell (born March 5, 1936) is a retired American actor of film and television, with a career spanning over 70 years.[1] As a child actor under contract to Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, he first came to the public's attention in films such as Anchors Aweigh (1945), The Green Years (1946), Gentleman's Agreement (1947), and Kim (1950).
birthplace: 美国,加利福尼亚州,好莱坞
